channel.title: How do you get rid of nulls?
channel.description:
Wow no joke people 10 players online and 28 NULLS!"!!!!!
They lagg my server and im not sure how to finally get rid of them does anyone know?? If they do can they please show me and yes I HAD looking on tutorial section
Please help me
1: Why do you get nulls??
2: Why are they there??
3: How can I get rid of them??
4: Do they lagg the server??

item.title: How do you get rid of nulls?
item.dc:creator: @Marc323909 Marc323909
item.description:
@Marc323909 wrote:

Alright is there a tutorial where I can learn how to

authenticate the login packet more securely, or authenticate users properly.

?? because I have been looking thorugh the tutorial section for one and still cannot find one[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 07, 2008, 04:36:14 PM[/size][hr]Anyone know how to?? get rid of nulls?

Read full topic
item.source: How do you get rid of nulls?

item.title: How do you get rid of nulls?
item.dc:creator: @newbiehacker newbiehacker
item.description:
@newbiehacker wrote:

You get nulls because of people abusing the login system that is inherent within all current runescape private servers.

Basically, they send fake login info that tricks the server into creating a dummy character which hogs resources, normally people do it in order to try and attack a server.

To get rid of them you will need to authenticate the login packet more securely, or authenticate users properly.

Yes, due to the nature of runescape private servers, they probably do lag the server.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you get rid of nulls?
